item.description: Lets make the short hop to KBAF for dinner. Bring a friend, family, or even a student pilot. Let me know if you would like a student when you RSVP. I'll rustle one up for ya. We always eat good there and it's about that time of year for our Wednesday Flight Night to begin. Check out their extensive menu online.....somewhere.....don't forget to get cleared through charlie airspace. Wheels up at 5:30 as usual. Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Wednesday night dinner at Barnes.... Nice and easy!
